text: Heres the documentation that explains how to enable a module or template for the beta <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/create-programmable-emails>
Hi! Can anyone help answer a few questions re: *styling external RSS feeds in HS emails*? I searched in the Community posts and this Slack channel but couldn't find any definitive answers.

Anyone know if you can control the options available in a rich text field in a custom module for email? I found this (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields/rich-text-editor>) but it talks about using it in a JSON file...

I know only a "quite hard" workaround:
create a custom module with just a rich-text, download it with CLI, adjust the settings as you like, upload the module via cli to the portal, use it
